title: Bug 6536: Adding Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens.
EB: After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the option to add Javadoc should be available and clicking on it should open a dialog box or panel where the Javadoc can be entered.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field in the view.
3. Attempt to add Javadoc on the selected field.
